Package hippodrome

Interface RacingTrackInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RacingTrack, RacingTrackStub

    public interface RacingTrackInterface
    Interface of the place where the races take place. Here each race is represented by an element of the class Race, described by a given number of tracks, an identification and a distance.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
